show pref activity when opening app
Some cleanup of the preferences screen
Fix bug where you change from once a minute to once a day and it didn't update right away
Have one preference activity for both narrow and wide widgets.
Use just one alarm for all widgets, wide and narrow
Add copyright headers to xml files and reformat xml files
Renamed classes from FrenchCalendar*.java to FRC*.java
Use the weekday and month names from lib-french-revolutionary-calendar

Add supports-screen to AndroidManifest.xml

(Maybe this is why it didn't appear on the play store for the Tattoo?)
Added build.xml and proguard config files
Issue #1: new version of lib-french-revolutionary-calendar with proper encoding.
Renamed project from FrenchCalendar to FRCAndroidWidget

Ignore lint warning about target sdk.

We don't want to target api level 19 because of behavior
changes in AlarmManager
Fix lint warnings about non-translated strings
Fix lint warning about missing xhdpi drawable
Fix ling warning about ImageView not having a description

Renamed package frenchcalendar to frcwidget and...

Fixed lint warnings about using dip instead of sp.
Changed the About screen to retrieve the app version from the PackageInfo.
Fixed bug where wrong scroll image was being used.
Backporting the work from 2013 to make widgets resizable.
Issue #2: add the day of the year
Issue #2: use the old widget class names for backward compatibility :/
Add setting to change the language
